name: Super Beam
description:
Super Beam is a fascinating VR rhythm game which has variety of methods to be with fantastic music. When targets are coming to you, you can slash them out and you will feel fantastic VR experence. You can feel like dancing while slashing targets listening to music!! There are 5 songs now however if you love this game, aditional songs will be update. Who knows next song will be from K-Pop idol??

*Song List*
1. "FAS" [Intense]
2. "FAS" [On]
3. "Studio PaloAlto" [50 Bucks]
4. "7 Keys" [In that Future Bass]
5. "FAS" [Are U Ready?]
